scripts.setup: npm install --silent && tsc --build && powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path .env)) { echo OPENAI_API_KEY= > .env } && mkdir storage && echo LOG START > storage/log.txt
scripts.start: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path .env)) { npm run setup }; if (Select-String -Path .env -Pattern '^OPENAI_API_KEY= *$' -Quiet) { Write-Host '[31mBitte f√ºge den OPENAI_API_KEY in das .env file ein[0m'; exit 1 }; node index"

config.checkEnv: node -e "if(!require('fs').readFileSync('.env','utf8').match(/OPENAI_API_KEY=.+/)){console.error('\u001b[31mError: OPENAI_API_KEY not set in .env file\u001b[0m');process.exit(1)}"
